name: Platformer Prototype (Konstantin Boyko)
description:
Prototype created for a single player action platformer. Play style was meant to evoke the feeling of fast-paced, air-combo-heavy, 2D fighting games like the Marvel vs. Capcom series.

In this limited prototype, you can jump around and beat up the hapless enemy NPC. See how long you can keep your combo going!

Controls
  • Keyboard arrows for movement
  • Up to jump and double-jump
  • Z to attack
  • WASD to control enemy
